means: 使古旧，废弃（antiquate的过去式和过去分词）

sentence.Network_en: They attempted in vain to modernise these antiquated industries.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们企图使这些陈旧的工业现代化,结果劳而无功.

sentence.Network_en: He claims that the laws are antiquated and have no contemporary relevance.
sentence.Network_cn: 他声称这些法规过于陈旧,已没有任何现实意义.

sentence.Network_en: The kitchen now is a dark cavern, with an antiquated black stove in a corner.
sentence.Network_cn: 厨房现在黑洞洞的，角落里有只破旧的黑色炉子。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the sense 'old, of long standing'): from ecclesiastical Latin antiquare 'make old', from antiquus (see antique)

entry.def: If you describe something as antiquated, you are criticizing it because it is very old or old-fashioned.

example.ex: Many factories are so antiquated they are not worth saving...
example.tran: 很多工厂过于陈旧落后，已不值得挽救。

example.ex: Do we really want a return to an antiquated system of privilege and elitism?
example.tran: 我们真的想回归到一种特权和精英政治的过时制度中吗？

means.word_mean: 1. so extremely old as seeming to belong to an earlier period;

auth_sentence.content: Dosen't this show that party politics are antiquated?
auth_sentence.res_content: Dosen't this show that party politics are antiquated?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Dosen't this show that party politics are antiquated?

auth_sentence.content: But their views are as groundless as they are antiquated.
auth_sentence.res_content: But their views are as groundless as they are antiquated.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But their views are as groundless as they are antiquated.

auth_sentence.content: Prejudice and antiquated jealousy did not easily yield themselves up.
auth_sentence.res_content: Prejudice and antiquated jealousy did not easily yield themselves up.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Prejudice and antiquated jealousy did not easily yield themselves up.

stems_affixes.word_buile: antiquate[v.使古旧, 废弃]+ed……的→adj.陈旧的,过时的
antiq古老+ue→adj.古式的,过时的　n.有价值的古物,古董
antiq古老+ue→adj.古式的,过时的　n.有价值的古物,古董
antiqui=antique[adj.古式的,过时的　n.有价值的古物,古董]+ty表名词→n.古老;高龄;古物,古迹

sentences.en: They attempted in vain to modernise these antiquated industries.
sentences.cn: 他们企图使这些陈旧的工业现代化,结果劳而无功。
